backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles, voice model storage, and conversion job creation with access control and blob handling.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adding a new jobIdCounter field by wrapping existing actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a frontend error‑surfacing feature to involved files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining global CSS variables for a warm color palette and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the frontend app and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing navigation, page container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AppNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with links, icons, and login button, highlighting active routes.
frontend/src/components/AudioUploadAndSu: Form component for creating conversion jobs with file upload, progress, and backend error extraction.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Gates children behind Internet Identity login, showing loader or sign‑in card when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the app's logo image at a fixed size.
frontend/src/components/EmptyStateHero.t: Displays a centered empty‑state section with optional image, title, description, and action element.
frontend/src/components/InlineAlert.tsx: Shows an inline alert with icon, title, and message based on variant.
frontend/src/components/JobsTable.tsx: Fetches and sorts conversion jobs, rendering them as JobStatusCards in a grid.
frontend/src/components/JobStatusCard.ts: Displays a conversion job’s status, timestamps, and download button for completed jobs.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Toggles login/logout using Internet Identity and shows corresponding button states.
frontend/src/components/ModelSelect.tsx: Provides a dropdown for selecting a voice model, handling loading and empty states.
Lists existing voice models with delete actions and creation dates.
frontend/src/components/VoiceModelUpload: Form for uploading a voice model with metadata, validation, progress, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversionJobs.ts: React Query hooks to list, fetch, and create voice conversion jobs with upload progress and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useModelNameLookup.ts: Returns a function that maps model IDs to their display names using fetched voice models.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceModels.ts: React Query hooks to fetch, upload, and delete voice models with upload progress and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus CSS variables defining themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CreateCoverPage.tsx: Page allowing users to upload audio and create covers; redirects to models page if none exist.
frontend/src/pages/JobsHistoryPage.tsx: Displays user's conversion job history with empty state handling and navigation to create page.
frontend/src/pages/VoiceModelsPage.tsx: Page for listing, uploading, and managing voice models with empty state support.
frontend/src/utils/actorErrorMessage.ts: Parses IC agent errors to extract clean, user-friendly error messages.
Downloads an ExternalBlob as an audio file by creating a temporary Blob URL.
frontend/src/utils/fileToBytes.ts: Converts a File to a Uint8Array with size validation and FileReader.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins such as typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state describing issues with missing voice model IDs, pending feature requests to fix cover‑generation behavior, and configuration for job lifecycle and error handling.
